name: Bygesa-Ugly Bastard Visual Novel Demo
description: Lawrence P'weens is a grumpy old college professor who is bored with his everyday life and hates his job. His everyday life changes when one of his students, Alex Ingus asks to drop out of his class. The beauty of this student gives him a wicked idea. Ugly Bastard is an 18+ boys love visual novel about Lawrence romancing Alex. With 3 different endings and 6 unique nsfw scenes coming to the coming official release.
